description: Chinese buttonbush (Adina rubella) is an amazing species of plant due to its numerous attractive qualities. This shrub can grow up to 3 metres in height, and displays spectacular clusters of small white flowers from summer to autumn. It is a fast-growing shrub with glossy, dark green leaves and deep red buds. Compared to other shrubs, Chinese buttonbush's long flowering season and striking appearance make it an excellent choice for gardens. In terms of hardiness, Chinese buttonbush can tolerate a range of environments including temperate climates and drought-prone areas. It is also very easy to cultivate as it requires minimal care. With its colourful blooms and fast-growing nature, Chinese buttonbush is an ideal addition to any garden!
